shortdesc.ph: Callback for the lyrics download URL.

p.codeblock: final void Function(String requestId, int songCode, String lyricUrl, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason)? onLyricResult;
public abstract void OnLyricResult(string requestId, long songCode, string lyricUrl, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason);

section.p: After you call to obtain the download URL for the lyrics of a specified song, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to obtain the lyric download URL for a specified song, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to get the lyrics download URL for a specific song, the SDK triggers this callback.
After you call to obtain the lyric download URL for a specified song, the SDK triggers this callback.

plentry.pd: Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.
